ChainReaction - Class in <Unnamed>
This is the outermost, main class which encloses everything else as well as extends Application.

ChainReaction.Board - Class in <Unnamed>

ChainReaction.InvalidMoveException - Exception in <Unnamed>
This class is for Exceptions where an invalid move is made by the player.
ChainReaction.Player - Class in <Unnamed>
This class represents a player, with each having his own instance.
ChainReaction.Point<T> - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is used for Point objects of the same (but any) type.
